item.title: By: Tom Raftery
item.dc:creator: Tom Raftery
item.description:
Excellent - any more details?
<a href="http://www.itcork.ie"/ rel="nofollow">it@cork</a> are holding a Web 2.0 mini conference on June 8th. Confirmed speakers so far include: Salim Ismail - founder of PubSub Shel Israel - co-author with Robert Scoble of naked Conversations and currently writing a book on Web 2.0 Fergus Burns - Founder and CEO of Nooked Microsoft have promised to send a speaker (and to sponsor) Google and Yahoo! are currently firming up their level of involvement as well.
Another one for the calendar!
item.content:encoded:
Excellent – any more details?

it@cork are holding a Web 2.0 mini conference on June 8th.
Confirmed speakers so far include:
Salim Ismail – founder of PubSub
Shel Israel – co-author with Robert Scoble of naked Conversations and currently writing a book on Web 2.0
Fergus Burns – Founder and CEO of Nooked
Microsoft have promised to send a speaker (and to sponsor)
Google and Yahoo! are currently firming up their level of involvement as well.

Another one for the calendar!
